nit: can be simplified a little:
```scala
    epochBumpResult.map { case (nextEpoch, lastEpoch) =>
      prepareTransitionTo(Empty, producerId, nextEpoch.toShort, lastEpoch, newTxnTimeoutMs,
        immutable.Set.empty[TopicPartition], -1, updateTimestamp)
    }
```
Would it simplify anything to replace `lastProducerId` and `lastProducerEpoch` with an `Option[ProducerIdAndEpoch]`?
I don't really think so, we use both of these individually pretty much immediately
Ok. I think my main concern was just type safety. Sentinel values have bit us in the past.
